name: 張文中
objective: Robotics Lab (RLab) is offered with all experimental in-class projects, same as its previous version “Robotics and Automation Applications (RAA)”.  Compared with Robotics course, this Robotics Lab (RLab) course is offered for undergraduate students with programming experience, but no particular prerequisites, such as Robotics, are required.  RLab focuses on projects in the areas of optical inspection, mobile robots, manipulators, visual servoing, and automation.  本課程為全實驗課程，等同於原先「機器人與自動化應用」之新版課程。相較於「機器人學」基礎分析課程，機器人學實習 (RLab) 屬應用課程、適合具備基礎程式能力的大學生修習，並無機器人學等先修課程要求。課程專題聚焦於光學檢測、移動式機器人、機械手臂、視覺伺服與自動化。
